prompts: Create a sleek water-type Pokemon that resembles a fish with vibrant colors.
Show me a playful Pokemon that lives in water, with distinctive fins and a shiny appearance.
Imagine a small aquatic creature that has a unique color pattern and graceful swimming abilities.
Design a Pokemon with a charming personality, featuring beautiful scales and a friendly demeanor.
Generate an image of a fish-like Pokemon that is known for its agility and beauty underwater.
Make a Pokemon that embodies the essence of tranquility with soft colors and flowing fins.
Give me a description of a Pokemon that thrives in calm waters, displaying elegant swimming styles.
